prompts.title: Explore My Preferences
prompts.text: Using the JSON I provided (and ask me for it if you don't have it), summarize my top priorities and suggest {{count}} specific, measurable directions for any topic that is missing them.

prompts.title: Develop a Preference Set
prompts.text: Using the schema I provided (ask me if you need it) and my current data, propose {{count}} topics I might care about. For each topic, include 2–3 concrete, testable directions.

prompts.title: Create a Sample Ballot
prompts.text: Using my current preference set and the ballot schema, create a sample ballot for {{jurisdiction}}. Link choices to relevant topics or directions with a one‑sentence rationale.
